title: Get a dinner set, plus wine glasses, for just £64.99
content:
It’s always worth investing in beautiful high-quality dinnerware and glasses, as not only will they make every meal feel that little bit special, but they’ll also last you for years to come. And, with this exclusive deal, it couldn’t be more economical to update both at the same time, as you can get your hands on this dining bundle from Mahahome for just £64.99 (plus free standard delivery or £4.50 for fast delivery).

Get your dining bundle

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

This elegant Mahahome dining bundle is perfect for everyday use and consists of:

  • The stylish porcelain and 22ct gold Portmeirion Torn 16-Piece Porcelain Dinner Set, which includes: 4 x dinner plates (27cm); 4 x side plates (19cm); 4 x bowls (14cm); 4 x mugs.
  • Ravenhead MODE Red Wine Set of 4 Glasses (34cl) – dishwasher safe, they’re ideal for enjoying a variety of different wines, thanks to a generous bowl that allows the wine to spread out, maximising the surface area exposed to the air so the bouquet can develop. They have also been designed with a slightly tapered rim to direct the flow of wine to the front palette, allowing the full flavours of the wine to be experienced.

Offer ends 10/05/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or offers.

Get your dining bundle

author: Steve Newell
